aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.text: Hi! I’m Ígara Yasmin, a Computer Engineering graduate who has dedicated the past few years to studying and building a career in software development. I’ve been strengthening my skills in various programming languages, frameworks, and agile methodologies. I’ve worked on diverse projects, collaborating with multidisciplinary teams, especially on the frontend using Angular, React.js, and WordPress. More recently, I’ve been working as a fullstack developer with C#, using technologies such as ASP.NET and Blazor, contributing to both backend and frontend of web applications. I’m excited to take on new challenges, explore meaningful opportunities, and continue growing as a professional. If you’re interested in collaborating or learning more about me, feel free to get in touch!

card1.title: Fullstack Developer
card1.item1: Fullstack developer working with C#, ASP.NET, and Blazor on internal projects and for major clients.
card1.item2: Highlighted experience in challenging projects for the client Ágora Investimentos (Bradesco Banking).
card1.item3: Frontend contributions, turning prototypes into intuitive and functional user interfaces.
card1.item4: Active involvement in backend development, implementing and integrating new features into the codebase.
card1.item5: Experience with Azure DevOps for task management, code versioning, and CI/CD pipeline automation.

card2.title: Software Developer
card2.item1: Front-end web development of CRUD systems and websites using HTML, CSS, React.js, JavaScript, Wordpress;
card2.item2: Back-end development of CRUD systems using Node.js with mongoDB and MySQL databases;
card2.item3: Development of conversational flows using zenvia flow;
card2.item4: Development of the requirements document of a project related to municipal education;

card3.title: Front-end Developer
card3.company: STTP - Superintendency of Traffic and Public Transportation
card3.item1: Front-end web development of CRUD systems and websites using HTML, CSS, Angular, TypeScript, Bootstrap;
card3.item2: Back-end web development of CRUD systems using Node.js with mongoDB;

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Websites and applications I’ve developed throughout my journey as a developer.
